description:
– You would like to build a career in the fashion industry?
– Maybe you already work in the world of beauty, clothes and style?
– Or maybe you are just interested in fashion and style?

————————————————————

  • We come across fashion world every day, when we’re getting dressed for work or for a party, or when we go shopping.
  • We often hear on TV or read in magazines about some trends. We read web articles about Fashion Weeks and we see pictures of celebrities wearing haute couture.

However, not everyone knows who creates fashion and where fashion trends come from. Even people, whose work is somehow connected with the fashion industry, don’t always understand, how this industry works.

The fashion industry has been always an exclusive secret world.

We offer you to find out the secrets of a fashion world with the course “What is fashion and how to enter fashion world”


To finish this course you will need less than an hour. You should take it course if you want to develop your skills and knowledge in fashion field.

Italian stylists will tell you the most current information!
title: What is fashion and how to enter fashion world
